pullRequest.title: Improve consistency of struts with existing tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
cc: @vovencij

add tests for redirect and error endpoints
sets struts version to first 2.3 version in maven central (2.3.1)
a couple other minor updates to be more consistent with other mvc framework tests

I had sent these updates as a PR to #1628, but I forgot to mention it in the PR, and then I accidentally deleted the branch which closed my PR 😅

commit.message: Improve consistency of struts with existing tests
